testsuite.name: ru.eas.repository.rest.IssueRestTest

testcase.name: when issue is saved correctly then ok()
when during saving repo throws exception then fail()
when repository returns issues then ok()
when repository returns empty list then ok()
when repository throw exception then status fail()
when issue is deleted then ok()
